section.title: Third-party dependencies
section.p: The spellers are built using HFST, divvunspell (source code) and a number of other packages in the Divvun GitHub repos. Some parts also depend on Voikko, especially LibreOffice-voikko extension (source code).

The spellers here are a direct application of the normative fst used as a spelling checker (in combination with an error model to create suggestions). There is always room for improvements, so please report any issues you find to feedback@divvun.no

section.title: Source code access
section.p: The source code repository for each language is found behind the links after each download link (and in general here), and instructions for how to build each language can be found by following the instructions here.
